name: Imperial Deception
description:
Imperial Deception is a two player otome strategy game, inspired by the villainess genre that has been going around in the manga and manhwa scenes. 

Twitter | Instagram 

Setting:

Saintess Ayanna and Rika Addington, the duke's daughter, both aim for the seat of the empress. Choose to play as either one against another player in a battle of wits, cunning and seduction. Recruit followers, send them on missions to influence your favorability with the four factions and get on the good side of the crown prince. Who of the two of you is the better schemer? 

Characters:

Chooseable MCs : Saintess Ayanna & Rika Addington 

The Crown Prince - Leon Ravenswood (Love Interest)

Mr. Narrator              

Demo Features:

*Available for PC and Mac!

  • Two-player
  • 1 hour of gameplay
  • 2 CGs, each with alternative version depending on chosen MC
  • 8 BGs 

Planned Future Features:

  • More Love Interests
  • More romance!
  • More intrigue

Everything shown in the demo is subject to change as progress is made on the game
